short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves Facebook Marketplace search by adding an estimated date listed back to the grid view and other features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Facebook Marketplace with Better Marketplace Lite!

In the fast-paced world of online deals, timing is everything. Better Marketplace Lite is designed to optimize your deal hunting on Facebook Marketplace, ensuring you never miss out on a great deal. Our extension helps you identify new listings quickly, streamlining your search and buying process.

Features:

Estimated Date Listed: Adds an estimated date listed back to the grid views on Marketplace, helping you spot new deals as soon as they appear.

Ignore Previously Seen Listings: Adds an option to visually dim listings that you've already seen, enabling your eyes to skip past them and focus on fresh options.

Better Marketplace Lite is all about efficiency and speed. With our tool, you can focus on what really matters - securing the best deals quickly.

Note: Currently supports a range of 60 miles or less. Pro version coming soon.
